title: Charitable Volunteers Tax Credit Incentive Act of 1995
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to create a tax credit not to exceed $500 for cash contributions made by an individual to a tax-exempt private charitable organization primarily assisting the poor, for which the individual must also have worked at least 50 hours. Denies such credit if the donor or a family member is an officer or employee of such organization, or has another specified relationship with the organization that would involve self-dealing.
